thread.title: 'I can't provide any guarantee for Thomas Müller' - Philipp Lahm says Bayern Munich star may switch to United
thread.title_full: 'I can't provide any guarantee for Thomas Müller' - Philipp Lahm says Bayern Munich star may switch to United - Herald.ie

author: Charlie Rusholme
title: 'I can't provide any guarantee for Thomas Müller' - Philipp Lahm says Bayern Munich star may switch to United
text:
Bayern Munich captain Philipp Lahm admits he cannot guarantee that Thomas Müller will not follow Bastian Schweinsteiger to Manchester United. Bayern Munich’s Thomas Müller celebrates with Philipp Lahm after his first goal against Valencia during their friendly match in Beijing last Saturday. Charlie Rusholme – 22 July 2015 02:30 AM
Reports in Germany have claimed that United are preparing to table a big-money move for the forward.
"It's not my decision," Lahm told reporters in Shanghai, where Bayern are preparing to face Inter Milan in a pre-season friendly. "Things can happen very quickly in football.
"I certainly can't provide any guarantee for Thomas Müller (staying)."
Lahm did insist there was no chance of him leaving Bayern, though.
"That's not going to happen with me," he said. "I'm pleased that I've been able to spend practically all my career at home.
"It's great to be in the same club for so long."
And Lahm is not concerned about Bayern, who have dominated German football for the past three years, losing their domestic dominance.
"We're still a top club," he said. "We've reached at least the semi-finals of the Champions League in recent years and we have a top team who would be playing at the top in any league.
"We certainly don't need to have any fear."
